DOC.brief_title: Impact Mass Zinc Fortification Programs Plasma Zinc Concentration
DOC.detailed_description: The objective present study determine whether plasma zinc concentration change response additional zinc consumption , provide zinc-fortified cereal-based complementary food feed adult men ( fortify level consistent currently propose level ) . The follow specific step complete : 1 . Zinc-fortified bread prepare zinc-fortified wheat flour develop assistance expert food technology . 2 . A four-week feeding trial implement assess change plasma zinc concentration among young adult men receive : ) bread fortify moderate amount zinc liquid vitamin preparation meal ; b ) bread fortify large amount zinc liquid vitamin preparation meal ; c ) non-zinc-fortified bread liquid vitamin preparation meal [ negative control group ] ; ) non-zinc-fortified bread zinc-containing liquid vitamin preparation meal [ positive control group ] .
